Title: Relates to establishing a uterine fibroids awareness and education program
Summary: Establishes a uterine fibroids awareness and education program on the symptoms, diagnosis and treatment of uterine fibroids and the elevated risk for minority women.
LawCode: Add Art 2 Title 6 ยง267-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing a uterine fibroids awareness and education program
